mapper.select: SELECT a.id ,COUNT(a.id) FROM (SELECT o.id ,t.taskId FROM cs_order o, cs_order_asset oa, cs_task t WHERE o.id={id} AND oa.id=t.order_asset_Id)a GROUP BY a.id HAVING a.id={id}

SELECT a.progress,b.currentUrl FROM (SELECT AVG(t.taskProgress)/101*100 AS progress FROM cs_task t ,cs_order_asset oa WHERE t.order_asset_Id =oa.id AND oa.orderId =#{orderId}) a CROSS JOIN (SELECT t.currentUrl FROM cs_task t ,cs_order_asset oa WHERE t.order_asset_Id=oa.id AND oa.orderId =#{orderId} ORDER BY t.execute_time DESC LIMIT 0,1) b
SELECT * FROM cs_task t,cs_order_asset oa WHERE t.order_asset_Id = oa.id AND oa.orderId=#{orderId} ORDER BY t.execute_time DESC limit 1
select count(*) FROM cs_order_asset oa WHERE oa.orderId=#{orderId}

SELECT MIN(t.execute_time) AS execute_time,MAX(t.end_time) AS end_time,AVG(t.scanTime) AS scanTime,AVG(t.issueCount) AS issueCount,AVG(t.requestCount) AS requestCount,AVG(t.urlCount) AS urlCount,AVG(t.averResponse) AS averResponse,AVG(t.averSendCount) AS averSendCount,AVG(t.sendBytes) AS sendBytes,AVG(t.receiveBytes) AS receiveBytes FROM cs_task t,cs_order_asset oa WHERE t.order_asset_Id = oa.id AND oa.orderId=#{orderId} and t.group_flag=#{group_flag} ORDER BY t.execute_time DESC
SELECT t.taskid,t.execute_time,t.group_flag FROM cs_task t,cs_order_asset oa WHERE t.order_asset_Id = oa.id AND oa.orderId=#{orderId} ORDER BY t.execute_time DESC
